name: Modern Leather Sofa
description: Premium leather sofa with ergonomic design, perfect for living rooms. Features high-quality leather upholstery and sturdy wooden frame.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Professional office chair with adjustable height, lumbar support, and breathable mesh back. Ideal for long working hours.

name: Solid Wood Dining Table
description: Beautiful handcrafted dining table made from premium teak wood. Seats 6 people comfortably with elegant design.

name: Queen Size Bed Frame
description: Modern queen-size bed frame with upholstered headboard and sturdy metal frame. Includes under-bed storage.

name: Bookshelf with Drawers
description: Versatile bookshelf with built-in drawers for storage. Perfect for organizing books, decor items, and personal belongings.

name: Smart LED TV 55"
description: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV with HDR, built-in WiFi, and voice control. Compatible with Netflix, Prime Video, and other streaming services.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling headphones with 30-hour battery life, touch controls, and crystal-clear sound quality.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX graphics, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and 144Hz display. Perfect for gaming and work.

name: Smartphone Pro Max
description: Latest smartphone with 6.7" OLED display, 256GB storage, triple camera system, and all-day battery life.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. LED indicator and non-slip design.

name: Indoor Bonsai Tree
description: Beautiful indoor bonsai tree with ceramic pot. Perfect for home decoration and air purification. Easy to maintain.

name: Garden Fountain Set
description: Elegant garden fountain with LED lighting and water pump. Creates a peaceful atmosphere in your outdoor space.

name: Succulent Garden Kit
description: Complete succulent garden kit with 5 different varieties, decorative pots, and care instructions. Perfect for beginners.

name: Outdoor Patio Set
description: Complete outdoor patio set with table and 4 chairs. Weather-resistant material perfect for garden or balcony.

name: Hanging Plant Pots
description: Set of 3 decorative hanging plant pots with macrame hangers. Perfect for indoor plants and vertical gardening.

name: Coffee Table with Storage
description: Modern coffee table with hidden storage compartment and elegant design. Perfect for living room organization.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, waterproof design, and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Wall Art Canvas
description: Beautiful canvas wall art featuring nature landscapes. Multiple sizes available, perfect for home decoration.

name: Table Lamp with USB
description: Modern table lamp with built-in USB charging port and adjustable brightness. Perfect for bedside or desk use.

name: Garden Tool Set
description: Complete garden tool set with 8 essential tools, storage case, and gardening gloves. Perfect for garden maintenance.
